entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 20.
